name: Wtb-research-GeoSpatial Analysis with R
body:
# Using R

Start by downloading the most recent version of R from the CRAN site.  Here are the packages you'll need to complete most of the mapping and graphics tasks used in Geo-Spatial analysis of our data.
* Rmap
* Rgdal
*
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
